title: Cherish
description: Sixteen year old Sarah Parker is afraid of returning to St. Mary's orphanage, afraid of losing her foster Mom, Ida and afraid of being happy. four years ago, Sarah was an orphan who'd lost hope of ever being adopted until Ida showed up. Sarah's pretty much settled into her "new life" when cracks appear in her comfort zone. When Marcus David, her boyfriend, is accused of murdering a student and Ida is attacked shortly thereafter, Sarah's deepest fears materialize. She loses Ida and Marcus in one breath and returns to St. Marys. Sarah is forced to participate in a deadly mind dissociation game inside St. Marys - only the toughest make it out alive. As Sarah readjusts to St. Mary's she learns the oprhanage holds crucial secrets to her past.
author: Sheritha Singh
